title: Deep Deceptions: A Game of Chance / Almost Forever
description: A GAME OF CHANCE (Mackenzie Family)Agent Chance Mackenzie had set up the perfect bait to catch an elusive evildoer: his daughter, Sunny Miller. And so Chance made himself the only man Sunny could trust – and then arranged for her long-missing father to find out about them. What Chance hadn’t foreseen was that Sunny had reasons of her own to be hiding from her father and now Chance’s deception had brought them both one step closer to the end of everything they held dear…ALMOST FOREVER (Spencer-Nyle Co)Claire Westerbrook found it hard to believe that Max Conroy was truly interested in her. Then she discovered he wasn’t. Max was studying her company for a takeover rand had decided the quickest way to make it happen was through her. Now Claire wants nothing to do with a man who could deceive her with so little remorse. But Max isn’t leaving Houston without securing everything he wants, and that includes Claire.
author: Linda Howard
